summary: This is an email from the NYSReportServer@usa.doj.gov address forwarding the 'Child Exploitation & Porn Update Report III' for Project Safe Childhood. It instructs Chiefs and the Project Safe Childhood Coordinator to remind assigned AUSAs to update their cases.
keyFacts: An email was sent on July 5, 2021, distributing a Child Exploitation & Porn Update Report for Project Safe Childhood.
The email is addressed to 'Chiefs and Project Safe Childhood Coordinator' and instructs them to remind assigned AUSAs (Assistant United States Attorneys) to update their cases.
The document is identified as part of the Epstein case files with the identifier EFTA00087364.
The email originates from a Department of Justice server (NYSReportServer@usa.doj.gov).
